features: 1.{100% original design} ：180°stainless steel extensiondegree adjustable super long handle，The length can be adjusted freely according to your height use on cleaning very conrer. It is specially equipped with a portable dustpan, which can be pedaled or hand-held. It has a very high cost performance.
2.The 100% natural TPR rubber attracts pet hair like a magnet to easily remove fur from carpets, rugs, hardwood ，This broom will not shed hair like other ordinary brooms.

3.{The unique broom scraping edge design}: windows, showers and windshields with ease. Works great to wipe away liquid spills on tile, concrete or any hardwood surface such as patio decks or interior flooring.
4.The advanced lock design make the dustbin stand steadily.You can easily place it in the corner without taking up space.it can also be hung up,all up to you !

5.{Easy to clean}Simply wash away excess cat hair and dog hair on the rubber broom bristles by using soapy water to sanitize and renew. Natural rubber is easy to clean and requires little maintenance,this is an advantage that the traditional brush broom absolutely does not have,If you have any question ,feedback freely !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This has been fantastic.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this because the birds make a mess of my patio under the bird feeder with all the hulls and dropped seed. I wanted something that would hold up on the cement and that I could clean (because — well, birds!). I thought this might wear down within a couple of months, but it is still going strong and does an awesome job sweeping everything together when I remember to turn it the right away. The step on dustpan is a little less perfect in its execution of its duties, but it’s still a decent dustpan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well except flimsy handle
reviews.reviewText: It works well, it doesn’t throw your dust and mess everywhere like a broom or get stuck between the bristles. For larger items that get stuck there is a spot in the dustpan that you can drag the bristles through. The only issue I have is the handle. It’s so FLIMSY.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the best broom I’ve ever bought!
reviews.reviewText: This room is easily the best room I’ve ever bought! It’s super easy to clean and it doesn’t have the nylon ends that fry overtime. Plus pet hair sticks to it like a dream!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great idea but has many flaws
reviews.reviewText: I got this because I had a similar one before for my hardwood floors and it worked very well and this one came with a dustpan that attached to the collapsible handle. I do like the large dustpan that sits flat on the floor (and therefore allows all the dirt to be easily swept into it) held in place with your foot. But the handle is flimsy (the pieces don't all fit well together so the pole doesn't feel strong). The rubber bristles aren't firm enough to get the dirt and hair off the rug well in my opinion. Also, the thin rubber on the dustpan easily warps (i.e., doesn't stay flat) so the dirt doesn't all get into the pan on one sweep. I'll keep this set, but will look for a better one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This broom is very sturdy, ignore reviews that say it’s not
reviews.reviewText: I bought this in hope that the reviews about the sturdiness were incorrect. I just used it on my carpet that had a lot of dog hair and pieces of torn up cardboard on it. I have back problems and can’t bend over and pick up the box pieces my puppy tears up. This work amazing and I couldn’t be happier. It is very sturdy, maybe the others didn’t put it together right. Also, I love the dust pan, all I have to do is step on it and sweep in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Adjustable handle/rod woobles and it doesn’t matter how much or how hard I try to tighten the screw on sections, it is never ever solid or sturdy. It’s a shame because it’s aesthetically pleasing, compact and great to sweep hair and dust, dustpan is nice and sturdy. Too bad I can’t send it back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This broom is amazing!
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical at first.I have a six year old white pit that sheds like crazy! We have dark hard wood floors.This broom sweeps up the hair from everywhere! The corners and edges. Even the furniture!!I also tried it as a dog brush and it worked great for that too!!You'll be amazed on how much dirt and hair this broom will sweep up. Not to mention how wonderful the adjustable angle broom head is!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Great broom for getting hair out of high pile carpets. I have a golden retriever and was looking for something to get her hair out of our shag area rug. This broom did the job. However, the handle isn’t that sturdy because of how it adjusts, so you can’t really apply a ton of pressure when using the broom. Overall I would still recommend with the caveat that you need to be slightly gentle when using.
